column1: * Commercial solid fuels only, i.e. bituminous coal and anthracite (hard coal), and lignite and brown (sub-bituminous) coal. Includes coal produced for Coal-to-Liquids and Coal-to-Gas transformations.
# Excludes Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania prior to 1985 and Slovenia prior to 1991.
Notes: Annual changes and shares of total are based on data expressed in tonnes oil equivalent.
Growth rates are adjusted for leap years.
